name: TheHUB-NantonRadio
0:
”Alexa, play hub radio”
”Alexa, start hub radio”
”Alexa, ask hub radio what is playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hub radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Nanton Community Broadcasting Association is a non-profit organization that provides a community, on-line only, broadcast that is hyper-focused on the Nanton Community. We have been informing, education, entertaining and contributing to the Nanton Community since 2021 and is made up of community volunteers and a board of directors.

This hyper-focused radio station is making Nanton a better community by being the central-nervous system of Nanton. With your continued support, Nanton Radio will become one of Canada's most powerful, small-town, hyper-focused radio stations.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
